title: Crop diversity increases through democratic decision-making
description: Crop diversity increases through democratic decision-making
content:
Scenario: Crop diversity increases through democratic decision-making
    Given Tom focused on high-value crops to maximize revenue under thin margins
    And crop diversity benefits soil health and risk distribution
    When democratic governance enables longer-term thinking
    Then workers vote to increase crop diversity supporting soil health
    And diversification reduces dependence on single crop market fluctuations
    And biodiversity increases through worker interest in varied cultivation
    And farm resilience improves through democratic long-term planning
    And workplace_elohim documents crop diversity benefits for economic and ecological health
